message.raw: Fixed a bug where upon compilation failure the temp file would be deleted. If it didn't exist because the compilation failed before even creating the file, BLACS crashed upon deletion. It now ignores if deletion fails upon compilation fail
message.html: Fixed a bug where upon compilation failure the temp file would be deleted. If it didn't exist because the compilation failed before even creating the file, BLACS crashed upon deletion. It now ignores if deletion fails upon compilation fail
